page.title: 06A day in the life of Ursula
page.content: When I wake up in the morning I like to read my book before getting up and having breakfast.My mum calls me and my brother Karl when breakfast is ready.I have a little play with the dog and at 8.30am I walk to school.At school today I wrote a poem about sand, did some maths and had Assembly with hymns and prayers before we went out to play.Afterwards we had to practice for Sports Day.In the afternoon we heard a story about a Big Friendly Giant. When I got home from school at about 3.30pm I got changed before going to play. Today we played tents,then we went in to watch television before having tea. After that I had a bath and went to bed at 7.30pm
